hotel_name: The Westin Las Vegas Hotel & Spa
review_text: Bad: The referbishment work started before 9am each morning and seemed to be right above our room, whixh meant we didn't get much sleep at all. Good: The location was great and the staff were fantastic. Special thanks to Darwin for our engagement gift which made our stay all the more enjoyable. I would stay here again!
review_title: A great hotel to explore Vegas from.
